channel.title: Logging in problems
channel.description:
First off, I'm a complete retard to all this stuff..No idea what an IP address is or port or anything. I have played the game for around 5 minutes on the downloadable version but the webclient hasn't worked for me. I've clicked start server and then tried logging in..Doesn't work..I've tried File> New Server (enter some number) and trying and then the new port and trying..nothing..If anyone is knows that to do. then please help. Most questions asked i won't be able to understand. :|
Thank you

item.title: Logging in problems
item.dc:creator: @Greeley_Estates Greeley Estates™
item.description:
@Greeley_Estates wrote:

T-R-A-V-I-S:

lol… read guide. you cant login to ur own server without doing port fordwarding fire wall no-ip and all that fun stuff. and get updated java

You can cennect to your own server without port forwarding…

Read full topic
